channel.title: vortigaunts, Alien grunts and other kind of xennians.
channel.description:
well I'm making this topic to see some things and know what ya think about the alien slave (aka: vortigaunts), Alien grunt (or Agrunt) and Alien controller also about the Sven coop Tor
Tor is this guy for those who doesn't know: ![](upload://6D607eYbeUW2cTdTGgsTgs9Wj6n.png)
so what I was thinking is that they are very simillar 1 each other (sorry if I didn't wrote well simillar, is the first time I wrote it...) I mean all they have a third arm and a lot of eyes, some of them have their own special things, like armor or fire power, but I've been thinking and there are some things wich make my head explode of questions when I think about them.
Like the Agrunts, they seem to being ''build'' in that freggin' factory or base in xen; and the controller seems a lot like Nihilianth but isn't so big and doesn't need that strange flying machine the Nihilianth has.
Also the alien slave and tor seem to be vortigaunts but tor isn't a slave but of course Tor is from a mod...
so I want to know your oppinnion about this things to see if I found a good or perfect answer for my questions inside my head (every day without answers a combine soldier kills a cat LoL)...

item.title: vortigaunts, Alien grunts and other kind of xennians.
item.dc:creator: Neoplayer2
item.description:
Wasn’t the Nihilanth on the run from the Combine, and they (they being the Nihilanth, Vortiguants, Alien Grunts, and Alien Controllers) settled on Xen? I thought somebody from Valve had confirmed that. I have no source, though, so I might be wrong.

Also, if what I remember is true, then danielsangeo is right and we should refer to them as Xenians (I think Xenians is more correct than Xennians, but that’s just me. I like “zeen-ee-an” more than “zen-ee-an”.).

Read full topic
item.source: vortigaunts, Alien grunts and other kind of xennians.

item.title: vortigaunts, Alien grunts and other kind of xennians.
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
I originally hailed from Baltimore but I moved to Seattle. Since the aliens moved to Xen, why can’t they be called Xenians in the same manner that I’m now a Seattleite?

Read full topic
item.source: vortigaunts, Alien grunts and other kind of xennians.

item.title: vortigaunts, Alien grunts and other kind of xennians.
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
None of the Xen creatures were under Combine control in HL1. They were hiding out on Xen from the combine when they invaded earth, if I remember correctly.

Read full topic
item.source: vortigaunts, Alien grunts and other kind of xennians.

item.title: vortigaunts, Alien grunts and other kind of xennians.
item.dc:creator: Orpheon
item.description:
xalener:

Ontopic, if all the xen creatures are under combine controll, why’d the visual style completely change from HL1 to 2? Style =/= graphical quality btw.

I don’t think it was ever said all the Xen creatures were under combine control, just the vortigaunts/alien grunts/controllers/Nihilianth. Of those, only the alien grunts appeared to have any Combine modifications to them, and any stylistic differences between them and the Combine elements seen in HL2 could be for any number of reasons, such as physiological differences, differences due to the time at which they were modified, etc, etc.

Read full topic
item.source: vortigaunts, Alien grunts and other kind of xennians.

item.title: vortigaunts, Alien grunts and other kind of xennians.
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
mechaelite:

martians are from mars, they are from somewhere and lived in xen to scape from the combine, also I think there are creatures wich come from xen like bullsquids and how the vorts, etc are living now on xen we can call them Xenians without any problem.

also if ya call them alien ppl can think is an alien from alien vs predator

Aliens aren’t from that fucking abomination kid.

Alien and Predator were once two RESPECTABLE and SEPERATE franchises. Now with this spinnoff shit it’s just a fucking money grabbing scheme. Robert rodriguez and Ridley scott had better do a damn good job on the next A/P (not avp) movies.

Ontopic, if all the xen creatures are under combine controll, why’d the visual style completely change from HL1 to 2? Style =/= graphical quality btw.

It would be cool for the BM xenians to hae more of the grey metallic combine look, but it’s probably too late to… wait… Fuck that!

opening up the texture in photoshop and messing with some levels (on masked out metal pards) ain’t that bad… But they’ve made their choice.

Read full topic
